subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Ricky Rubio, an 18-year-old from Spain, has decided to enter the N.B.A. draft. Rubio, a 6-foot-2 point guard, has been rated as one of the top picks. He was under contract with the Spanish club DKV Joventut through 2011, but has a $7.8 million buyout clause. Rubio was part of the Spanish team that won the silver medal at the Beijing Olympics. He is averaging 9.9 points and 5.7 assists for Joventut. Rubio turns 19 in October, meeting the N.B.A.’s minimum age requirement.
